tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IoT_Access_Control (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    role_id INT,
    role_name VARCHAR(50),
    permission_level INT
)
CREATE TABLE IoT_Device ( device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, device_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, mac_address VARCHAR(17) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE User_Roles ( role_id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, permissions TEXT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE User_Accounts ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, role_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES User_Roles(role_id) );

CREATE TABLE Device_Access ( user_id INT, device_id INT, access_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES User_Accounts(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_Device(device_id) );
